section.title: Matlab Interface
section.para: This is an interface to the Matlab C API. The package MATLAB is case-sensitive, so you would write (matlab:engOpen ...) when you need to call engOpen().

formalpara.para: Return a &vector-t; of &string-t;s naming the variables in file mf (opened using matOpen).
Make sure *engine* is valid and return it.
Run the body wuth the engine bound to a Matlab engine (default *engine*).
Open the matlab file, do the &body-r;.
Copy data from the 2-dimensional lisp array to the Matlab matrix.
Copy the 2-dimensional lisp array to the Matlab variable (a &string-t;) in the supplied engine (defaults to *engine*).
Copy the matlab matrix to the 2-dimensional lisp array (created anew or re-used if supplied).
Copy data from the matlab variable to the 2-dimensional lisp array (created anew or re-used if supplied).
Invert the lisp matrix using the specified engine.
